Detailed Description

MLX N-dimensional array object.

◆ mlx_array_data_bool()

const bool * mlx_array_data_bool ( mlx_array arr)

Returns a pointer to the array data, cast to bool*.

Array must be evaluated, otherwise returns NULL.

const int * shape,
int dim,

Parameters
dataA buffer which will be copied.
shapeShape of the array.
dimNumber of dimensions (size of shape).
dtypeType of array elements.
